projects.name: Komaza Smallholder Farmer Forestry Kenya
projects.project_type: Agriculture Forestry and Other Land Use

boundary_coordinates.note: Project consists of 12,500+ individual farm polygons. Full coordinates in KML file.

social_community_data.note: Social community data is simulated for demonstration purposes. Real data would require field surveys.

projects.name: Boomitra Grassland Restoration in East Africa Through Soil Enrichment
projects.project_type: Agriculture Forestry and Other Land Use

boundary_coordinates.note: Project consists of 450+ individual landowner parcels. Full coordinates in KML file.

social_community_data.note: Social community data is simulated for demonstration purposes. Real data would require field surveys.

projects.name: Kenya Climate Smart Agriculture Program
projects.project_type: Agriculture Forestry and Other Land Use

boundary_coordinates.note: Project covers Turkana County. Full boundary coordinates in KML file.

social_community_data.note: Social community data is simulated for demonstration purposes. Real data would require field surveys.

social_community_data.description: SocialCoMMs - Comprehensive Social Community Monitoring and Measurement System
social_community_data.note: All social community data is simulated/mock data for demonstration purposes. Real data collection would require field surveys and monitoring systems.

decision_making.description: Women's participation in household and community decisions

project_transparency.description: Perception of project information sharing and openness

fair_benefit_distribution.description: Perception of fairness in benefit sharing

conflict_resolution.description: Effectiveness of traditional and formal conflict resolution

cultural_preservation.description: Maintenance of cultural practices and traditions

carbon_credits_summary.note: VCS1468 credits are estimated based on project documentation. Other projects have mock data as they are recently registered or under validation.

community_benefits_summary.note: All community benefit data is simulated for demonstration purposes.
